description: Detects a suspicious curl process start on Windows and outputs the requested document to a local file
false_positives: Scripts created by developers and admins
name: Suspicious Curl Usage on Windows
query: ((process.executable:*\\curl.exe OR Product:"The\ curl\ executable") AND process.command_line:(*\ \-O* OR *\-\-remote\-name*))
author: Florian Roth
